EmailTemplate.name: RE: $15,000 Off Turbonomic for State & Local Institutions (1494854745.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: $15,000 Off Turbonomic for State & Local Institutions (1494854745.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean DocumentEmail false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 David, Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today. Below is a summary of a special offer we are doing at Turbonomic and the information that you requested. I wanted to include the City of Garland because it is a great use case around how we were able to defer hardware out of their infrastructure while also still allowing them to deliver a high level of performance. Seminole County Public Schools: <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jEtWdsbOI1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhRDkK6Vj7tlIHKbJ5MP7th24d09qz4iCYAssmQkwHhPWIXRllCfT%5FPZbQQsBS1HYonBwGw3GvDEosorBwMjJAO58eFSYaj10eO%5FGqUxSGgE2QtyeLK4nGICJNGr%5F0IhUwe438SerPYsRyU7591sAgx2L9xqiZ29K4iechlxgezZgn24N30XNE8G%2DGDuNCjv%5FADeRw60pEvTEPEEAnqG4ywV3NI%5FBzVoxAWBQpnBAReIcUmljezs3ptWuw7YTi8miABzG0s5K9v9r%5FhiCLIfXq4bjDHtk32lknmbw%2C%2C/j0FVcsLGLllNoVdlsbPWJbvomjvDc4qrt7kzH%5Fryx9081gZ9feGAPVn7jcFfHZ5%5FaeCQCkwaAIBgnxlKFr2daJRQ6bAOKgTgfn6tprXPfY9Bf7t%2D1cIv%5FKeonTIjvc3PkVPCHUoAVDQ%2DQhONZbAhgC6iYrYXShGF9XXOOI4g0RsrtY5J5Yeofran6D6T4UvU9XueMFc76cqP1UizB8Q4g%2DIglHsuy1R3T%2DHg1jndh%2D4HrC9u2P1lyE5N%2DMRkEMhCpUGvfXTn3bfBGrpDV56EpfHrlcgORh87voJrKEqUen8%2C]]> With Turbonomic’s real-time capacity management to simulate a migration from old Dell hosts to new Cisco UCS blades, the team learned they could consolidate from 12 hosts down to 3, enabling them to save nearly $80,000. These funds can now be reallocated to new projects focused on innovation, such as collapsing and centralizing much of their remote site infrastructure to enable more unified IT management. Garland, Texas Saves More Than $200,000 with Turbonomic <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE5TdcPNL1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhWGUCnSzj6oKLVY4FHdKZg38lu8KS2lmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXY5yghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYSZrl2U003o2AyXGGZYt%5FiB30iSKKxyteRQtnsuxloKSs792mftzoUvhHMB%2DMVvoBU%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DPOQbxDmjl3dget0XRS2SiwAE%5FnYjh%5Fhe74TeqCycXijuHALTmCf%2DxQzzG5cAy1WGsvkStCnaGxXs8rZ3UHKMCauZ6gg%2C/j0xQcMDII1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpxd9z2kdwZunBLA76mN9eHZYhKt2LEwAfHZ9syQ8VOemBZadB6PlcBUX%5Fay78g6TJfMB9ZbthxY9x%2D6761WsRlcmNmQGeEXova0tmRwW4R4Yvog%2D2Z4Q6Xi%2DGwnPNP6MQnRIdgqko%2DIqMb724qHCKwFffxQCpHVBx0cbeuXj5X70%2C]]> (not a Florida use case but I thought you’d find it interesting) Please let me know if there is interest in hearing more, I’d be happy to set up the introduction call. Best regards, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Thursday, May 11, 2017 3:55 PM To: 'david.mclean@stpete.org' <david.mclean@stpete.org> Subject: $15,000 Off Turbonomic for State & Local Institutions Hi David, I’m reaching out with a special offer for State and Local organizations as we approach the summer months. I’ve worked with a number of cities including City of Miami, and Orange County (to name local Florida customers) to alleviate their IT management challenges. They generally run within a June or July budget cycle and occasionally have remaining funds towards the end of their fiscal year. I typically find these customers bear one of two prevalent problems:· · Their IT environments are highly fragmented, marked by high inefficiency and/or· Their staff is limited, thinly spread and under-resourced. Turbonomic directly addresses both of these challenges. With that in mind, we’d like to offer a $15,000 discount for any deal with us, if you install Turbonomic’s autonomic performance platform before the end of May. You can find the free 30-day trial here <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jE5Sd8XLKlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhZCle7XHXyg63fboNuYqBj2dVksae33yYQo9nfwhrJEVscQSxBUDOFb5cOnQS1PJsTayrV12HFbYUUujgKorEP5qWGZ5250XuOwXXcwAK7YX5K1dW1zlemI7o7k%5Fk2jlgI3HU%5FUPrHsg%5FNwe0Low9o2%5FUnlDJl2690B%5FNx4kHZByXuwpvCd8V7Rue%2Dg9ug5akYRyxmiIgEbWzccE%2DyOKeNQHAo5RWkuGQBPDQ3DBR%5FWMMKsweonllqTeY3QRacrjAayTY01%5FoIzrDhkyKTO1HtCnPMqRSM%5FgiKIKMvwCa8k90DxwDVPy2%2D%5FtdRAEGGAuDdomPtG9aL%5FQ%2C%2C/j09UcszOKllNoVdlsbPWJbvomjvDc4qrt7kzH%5Fryx9081gZ9feGAPVn7jcFfHZ5%5FaeCQCkwaAIBgnxlKFr2daJRQ6bAOKgTgfn6tprXPfY9Bf7t%2D1cIv%5FKeonTIjrtKVnFDDCEsdBSNKcBOPa7AuizDuM91wD06D%2D2KMIZUqnSRN15tC25m%5FQqe78C7y7XHnxw%2DEF1csxvGNz3HoWY8vyfU3lRcu4kY%5Ff9X382ef1KoPsAF%2Dp8pUoAlEwMlhOeBdxzqIUhHkodzcCrtK]]> or by visiting turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial/. Do you have time in the coming month or so for a quick discussion around the benefits that you and the team at City of St. Petersburg could see after installing Turbonomic into your environment. Best, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jE5Sd8XLKlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhZCle7XHXyg63fboNuYqBj2dVksae33yYQo9nfwhrJEVscQSxBUDOFb5cOnQS1PJsTayrV12HFbYUUujgKorEP5qWGZ5250XuOwXXcwAK7YX5K1dW1zlemI7o7k%5Fk2jlgI3HU%5FUPrHsg%5FNwe0Low9o2%5FUnlDJl2690B%5FNx4kHZByXuwpvCd8V7Rue%2Dg9ug5akYRyxmiIgEbWzccE%2DyOKeNQHAo5RWkuGQBPDQ3DBR%5FWMMKsweonllqTeY3QRacrjAayTY01%5FoIzrDhkyKTO1HtCnPMqRSM%5FgiKIKMvwCa8k90DxwDVPy2%2D%5FtdRAEGGAuDdomPtG9aL%5FQ%2C%2C/j0lZdcLKKFlNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwt0x3V19ZqOQNUr7t8deF89gfdy%5FKjgaMJYw4jxOP83BKZYFqNdrIRe4Ui3mgpTbf98WZ6JZxeYkrY6G9XUunOiRi3X5LmYPTERrIVW5LOwExzHoJ5UxEgqJ%5FGnAJpMxiSsckK8Bm5Gkbqen]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jE5Sd8XLKlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhZCle7XHXyg63fboNuYqBj2dVksae33yYQo9nfwhrJEVscQSxBUDOFb5cOnQS1PJsTayrV12HFbYUUujgKorEP5qWGZ5250XuOwXXcwAK7YX5K1dW1zlemI7o7k%5Fk2jlgI3HU%5FUPrHsg%5FNwe0Low9o2%5FUnlDJl2690B%5FNx4kHZByXuwpvCd8V7Rue%2Dg9ug5akYRyxmiIgEbWzccE%2DyOKeNQHAo5RWkuGQBPDQ3DBR%5FWMMKsweonllqTeY3QRacrjAayTY01%5FoIzrDhkyKTO1HtCnPMqRSM%5FgiKIKMvwCa8k90DxwDVPy2%2D%5FtdRAEGGAuDdomPtG9aL%5FQ%2C%2C/h01QccLHdlBQuVN5sfaYL6z%2D0SLJdpuno5xpHOXk3cEx1EF9PO%5FANR7ig8duCJ05OLuGNCM7KZpCxl16KvawUdQV7LAPKXeYDjH1lrjYWoxeI%2Dxlyut42O33%5FkMov%5Fa0p0%5FVIHopaXBgUQHYOptl1xk%2C]]>
